= Introduction =

deploy jia2 on your xamp


= Details =

1. Checkout source code to your web directory.<br>
2. Import Jia2.sql under /resource/Jia2.sql.<br>
4. Recommend create a apache vhost.<br>
5. Change config
/application/config/config.php(site_url & base_url as your host setting)
/application/config/database.php(database name pass)
if you do not use vhost maybe you need edit /.htaccess
